name: Giraffoe
description:
• The game requires quite powerful PC
  • Control Giraffe using WSAD keys
  • Grow or shrink your neck using SPACEBAR and F-key
  • Changing size cost you hp points (represented by a bar)
  • Eat to replenish your hp and getscore (You need to hit tree crown directly with giraffes head)
  • If you fall over or get stuck press R-key to reset position without resteing the game
  • Press T-key to restart the game
  • Use ESC-key to exit the game
